name: Slime sweeper
description:
Slime sweeper is a game made by Broken-Bytes, a group dedicated to making games of somewhat passable to gracefully mediocre quality. 

 In this game you play as Space Ace the greatest intergalactic janitor to star in our game as you work tirelessly to keep the many slime animals that get flushed down access ports from clogging up your ships waste tanks. You do this by selecting slimes in the various tanks and then selecting the new tank that they will be housed in, slime's like to bond with like slimes and will fuse together to create more powerful slimes but only if they are the same level. Each tank can only hold four slimes before it will clog so you have to keep them dispersed or fused until you get promoted or quit or whatever, do a good enough job and you might even get a raise* for all of your hard work.

Happy cleaning. *Raise is not guaranteed and will be in the form or a Spacemall coupon.
